function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tele-treatment technology may lead to potential data security and privacy risks due to the transmission of sensitive medical information over a network.","Impact":"Exposure of confidential patient data, potential unauthorized access to medical records, and compromised patient privacy.","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust encryption protocols, secure data transmission methods, and compliance with data privacy regulations.","Technologies":"End-to-end encryption, secure data transmission protocols, data anonymization techniques.","People":"Patients, medical professionals, healthcare institutions.","Owner":"IT security professionals, healthcare administrators, network administrators."},{"Description":"Reliability and quality of remote treatment may be compromised due to network connectivity issues, leading to ineffective or delayed treatment for infectors.","Impact":"Inaccurate diagnosis, delayed medical intervention, and ineffective treatment leading to worsened health outcomes for patients.","Mitigation":"Redundancy in network connectivity, remote equipment maintenance, and training for medical staff to handle connectivity issues.","Technologies":"Network redundancy solutions, remote equipment monitoring systems, staff training on troubleshooting network issues.","People":"Medical teams, infectors, healthcare administrators.","Owner":"Healthcare technology providers, network administrators, medical training professionals."},{"Description":"Rapid deployment of tele-treatment technology may lead to lack of standardization and oversight, resulting in inadequately trained personnel and potential errors in treatment procedures.","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, incorrect treatment procedures, and compromised patient safety due to inadequate training and oversight.","Mitigation":"Establishment of standardized tele-treatment protocols, comprehensive training programs, and regular auditing of tele-treatment practices.","Technologies":"Tele-treatment protocol development tools, training simulation software, tele-auditing systems.","People":"Medical professionals, healthcare institutions, patients.","Owner":"Healthcare regulatory bodies, medical education institutions, healthcare administrators."}]}
